html:
Their strength is to sit still "Rahab the Inactive"— ,The two last words, ,שבת הם ,hem shabeth ,, joined into one, make the participle pihel ,המשבת ,hammeshabbeth ,. I find the learned Professor Doederlein, in his version of Isaiah, and note on this place, has given the same conjecture; which he speaks of as having been formerly published by him. A concurrence of different persons in the same conjecture adds to it a greater degree of probability.

,
